statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -11 \\ 7 \\ 13 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 19 \\ -12 \\ -22 \\ -16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
